getTileVelocity

public float getTileVelocity(int delta)
Description copied from class: de.myreality.dev.littlewars.objects.TileObject
Function that calculates a correct velocity in order to move from one tile to another. Additionally, the frame's delta is considered.

Specified by:
getTileVelocity in class de.myreality.dev.littlewars.objects.TileObject
Parameters:
delta - frame's delta
